answerText: neutrinos[10] Only neutrinos with left-handed helicity have been observed. Helicity is defined as the dot product between this quantity and linear momentum. Magnons carry the waves of this.

question: Question: This particle is involved in beta decay. For 10 points each: [10] Name this lepton that Pauli postulated to explain the conservation of angular momentum in the decay of neutrons into protons.
